仕事を上げる: (しごとをあげる) - to finish the work
仕事を済ます: (しごとをすます) - to finish one's work
仕事を辞める: (しごとをやめる) - to quit one's job; to resign
仕事一筋: (しごとひとすじ) - (yoji) living only for one's work; a life with no other interest than one's work
仕事一途: (しごといちず) - (yoji) singlemindedly devoted to work
仕事中: (しごとちゅう) - at work; in the midst of work; working
仕事中毒者: (しごとちゅうどくしゃ) - workaholic
仕事人: (しごとにん) - professional; person good at a particular job; person who does their job without mistakes
仕事人間: (しごとにんげん) - (yoji) fiend for work; workaholic; career-minded person
仕事口: (しごとぐち) - work opening; work position
仕事場: (しごとば) - place where one works; construction site; working area
仕事始: (しごとはじめ) - resuming work after the New Year's vacation; first time that one works in the year

仕事帰り: (しごとがえり) - going home from work; on the way home from work
仕事振り: (しごとぶり) - the way one works
仕事探し: (しごとさがし) - job hunting; job searching
仕事着: (しごとぎ) - work clothes; business suit
仕事第一主義: (しごとだいいちしゅぎ) - workaholism
仕事運: (しごとうん) - one's fate (fortune) as concerns business
仕事量: (しごとりょう) - (one's) workload; amount of work (to be) done by one
仕事関係者: (しごとかんけいしゃ) - business associate
仕付け: (しつけ) - tacking (in needlework)/basting; planting (esp. rice seedlings); discipline/training/teaching manners
仕付ける: (しつける) - to be used to/to get accustomed to/to be in the habit of doing; to train/to discipline/to teach manners; to tack (in needlework)/to baste; to plant (esp. rice seedlings)
仕入れる: (しいれる) - to lay in stock; to replenish stock; to procure; to learn something that might be useful later

仕入れ物: (しいれもの) - stock of goods received
仕入れ高: (しいれだか) - quantity or value of goods laid in

仕兼ねない: (しかねない) - capable of anything; liable to do
仕兼ねる: (しかねる) - to be reluctant to do; to hesitate to do; to refuse to do; to be unable to do
仕出かす: (しでかす) - to make a mess; to perpetrate; to do; to finish up; to be guilty of
仕出し弁当: (しだしべんとう) - box lunches for delivery; catering meal
仕出す: (しだす) - to begin to do; cater
仕出来す: (しでかす) - to make a mess; to perpetrate; to do; to finish up; to be guilty of
仕分ける: (しわける) - to assort; to classify; to journalize (in accounting); to journalise
仕切: (しきり) - partition/division/boundary/compartment; settlement of accounts; {sumo} preliminary warm-up ritual/toeing the mark
仕切り: (しきり) - partition/division/boundary/compartment; settlement of accounts; {sumo} preliminary warm-up ritual/toeing the mark

仕切り売買: (しきりばいばい) - transactions on dealer's terms
仕切り書: (しきりしょ) - consolidated monthly invoice; itemized invoice; itemised invoice; statement of accounts
仕切り板: (しきりいた) - partition board/plank used as a partition; board used in a ship to prevent the cargo from moving around
仕切り直し: (しきりなおし) - {sumo} getting poised again for charging/toeing the mark again; starting again/getting a fresh start/going back to square one
仕切り線: (しきりせん) - {sumo} starting lines in the ring
仕切る: (しきる) - to partition/to divide/to mark off/to itemize; to direct/to take control/to manage/to take responsibility; to settle accounts; to toe the mark
仕切価格: (しきりかかく) - settlement price; invoice price
仕切書: (しきりしょ) - consolidated monthly invoice; itemized invoice; itemised invoice; statement of accounts
仕初: (しぞめ) - outset/beginning/starting (things); resuming work after the New Year's vacation
仕初め: (しぞめ) - outset/beginning/starting (things); resuming work after the New Year's vacation
仕勝ち: (しがち) - apt to do; liable to do; tend to do; prone to do

仕合わせ者: (しあわせもの) - fortunate person; lucky fellow; lucky dog

仕向る: (しむける) - to induce (somebody to do something)/to tempt; to act toward (somebody in a certain way)/to handle (men)/to treat; to send/to forward to

仕懸る: (しかかる) - to start something; to have started something, but not yet finished it
仕所: (しどころ) - appropriate time to do (something); occasion when (something) must be done

仕手柱: (してばしら) - upstage right pillar (on a noh stage), where the main actor stands at the start and end of the play
仕打ち: (しうち) - (poor) treatment; (bad) behavior; behaviour; action; act
仕拵え: (しこしらえ) - preparation (e.g. of land for tilling); ground clearance; clearing
仕掛: (しかけ) - device/contrivance/mechanism/gadget; trick/trap/calculated manipulation/gambit; (small) scale/half finished; commencement/initiation; set up/laying out/preparation; challenge/attack
仕掛かる: (しかかる) - to start something; to have started something, but not yet finished it
仕掛け: (shikake) - dispositivo, engenhoca, mecanismo, aparelho; truque, armadilha, manipulação calculada, manobra, dispositivo, engenhoca, mecanismo, aparelho; truque, armadilha, manipulação calculada, manobra; escala (pequena), meio acabado; começo, início
仕掛ける: (しかける) - to start/to begin/to commence; to challenge/to pick (a fight)/to make (war); to set (traps)/to plant (explosives)/to lay (mines)
